meanings.definition: A type of marine animal with eight arms and a soft body.
meanings.sent1: Octopods are fascinating creatures that live in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of octopods swimming gracefully in the sea.
meanings.sent3: The octopods decided to have a dance party under the sea.
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed behind her like the arms of an octopod.
meanings.sent5: The octopods changed colors to blend in with their surroundings.
